name: Texture
desc: A rectangle upon which a backend texture is mapped.

fields.name: textureId
fields.desc: The identity of the backend texture.

fields.name: freeze
fields.desc: When true the texture will not be updated with new frames.

fields.name: filterQuality
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.Texture.filterQuality} The quality of sampling the texture and rendering it on screen.
